did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Ithaca Video Festival media collection, 1977-1983.
did.physdesc: Memorex and u-matic format video cassettes
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Videotapes from the screening program of the annual touring video festival.

bioghist.p: The Ithaca Video Festival was founded in Ithaca, New York in 1975 under the direction of Philip Mallory Jones.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Videotapes from the screening program of the annual touring video festival.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ithaca Video Festival Media Collection, #8235. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Due to the fragility and potential degradation of moving image and sound recordings, viewing and listening is limited to items that have been digitized. If an item is in another media format, you may request to have the item digitized for access. Information on ordering access copies may be found on our Reproductions and Permissions page.
